text: Alexander Loyd (August 19, 1805 - May 7, 1872Chicago Tribune Obit, dated May 8, 1872, page 6.) was an American politician. He served one term as Mayor of Chicago, Illinois from 1840 until 1841 for the Democratic Party. Loyd was born on August 19, 1805 in Orange County, New York. He was raised in Chicago. He was married until her death. They had four children. Loyd died on May 7, 1872 in West Lyons, Illinois from heart failure, aged 66. ==References== ==Other websites== * Inaugural Address * Grave at Rosehill Cemetery Category:1805 births Category:1872 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Burials at Rosehill Cemetery Category:Mayors of Chicago Category:Politicians from New York (state) Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Alexander Loyd
